website_summaries.verdict: The Brother MFC-J430W delivers printed pages at a speedy pace and is easy to set up and use. However, its print quality just isn't as good as what you'll get from rival models at a similar price.
cons: Colours in graphics and photos are a little washed out

customer_reviews.title: A great printer....
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is still in production but if I needed a printer I would buy this. I know, it is big and takes up acres of desk, but put it somewhere else then. It is worth it. It does everything but make my coffee. The wireless part is amazing. Even our Ipads & phone. And it can print photo quality pictures on glossy, or scan your photo so you can do away with the tons of pictures in the closet. And I think it only jammed once, maybe twice. I've had a lot of printers and this one had made me the happiest.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: I had already gone through an HP....with their super expensive ink and a Kodak who claims their ink was cheap....(heh) and at a personal endorsement from my son, I ordered This printer. I like how the paper stores within the machine and the over all size of it. It practically hooked itself up to my WIFI. Also should be mentioned that it will print in black if that's what you need and having separate cartridges is much better even in the size of the cartridges that come with the machine.......if you don't want the long cartridges. I'm running mine with an iMac and it works compatibly with iPhoto and prints from my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Fiberphyl

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: My sister has had a Brothers all-in-one for several years, so I decided to try it. Love the fact that it's wireless. And the ink cost is a fraction of what I paid when I had Epson & Canon printers. Only complaint I would have (which isn't a big problem for me) is the time it takes to copy, and you have to be copied page-by-page. The scanner is nice and user-friendly and fairly fast, though.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L. Dowden

customer_reviews.title: Jams Paper
customer_reviews.text: The brother's printer is constantly jamming my paper as did the previous one before it but this one even worse. I thought maybe it the 1st one was just a freak and so I bought the 2nd and it being worse don't think there will be a 3rd. The reason I bought it was the ink prices being cheaper but having to fight to get my paper out of the machine well lets say the end don't justify the means. so let summarize. Ink is cheaper, printing is good, performance is lousy at best plan on getting a lot of paper ate up.
customer_reviews.author: jeepgeep

customer_reviews.title: Good, easy to use and okay with ink
customer_reviews.text: These days you can always find good inexpensive inkjet printers. The challenges is to not have to change ink cartridges every five minutes. I have bought a series of these printers and they work great. We have moved to a lot of scanning and are trying to go paperless as possible. They tend to network okay in a small office/ home setting. In setting them up some set up quick, others had challenges for no apparent reason. brothers customer support with quick and in a,language I could understand. If you find high volume cartridges and buy from a reputable discounter of ink, you can keep your ink costs way down.
customer_reviews.author: Dtag0001

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want cheap ink.
customer_reviews.text: You can get very cheap ink for this. Now my kids can print out as many pictures as they want :) Black clogged up on me once, but I was able to clear it out with alcohol. Photos printed with the cheap ink are not the best quality, but they are goo enough for school projects. My only complaint is that the paper tray does not take photo sized paper (4x6)
customer_reviews.author: C. Law

customer_reviews.title: Perfect transaction
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in perfect condition. Easy to set up and working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Printer does not print dark enough
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this printer and it arrived right on time so problem with that part. But it does not have a dark print to it and does terrible on photos or pictures. It is lame when it comes to printing even the black is not dark. I have reset and tried all kind of settings but nothing helps. At least the shipper and the Biz that sold it to me did everything right. It just the printer is no good, does anyone else have this problem if not I should send this printer back.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: LOVE BROTHER PRODUCTS!
customer_reviews.text: Item came in timely. I find BROTHER products to be the most cost effective for the price. I purchased an all-in-one HP, but it did not WOW me for the money paid and the more expensive cost of ink. I returned it and purchased this all-in-one. My family members have purchased the same all-in-one so we can buy ink in bulk which is even more cost effective! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Constantina

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer
customer_reviews.text: As a household and business, we have three Brother printers. They seem to work reasonably well. This model is especially good. I bought this printer for my daughter to take to college. It is relatively inexpensive to operate and doesn't have the number of problems that our other printers have. The seller delivered the printer in good shape and promptly.
customer_reviews.author: W. A. Harrell

customer_reviews.title: I love Brother printers the last one lasted ten years.
customer_reviews.text: We fed a brick of paper to the j430 with no ploblem at all. The fax is the best ever. Are old fax is at goodwill. The best of the best is the wireless printing. I must warn this printer will change the way you think of a printer. Untill they put a camera or iphone adapter on it, This is the best for the buck. p.s. The ink is cheap too..
customer_reviews.author: thereisnospoon

customer_reviews.title: Printer will not remain connected to the wireless network.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get this printer to connect to my wireless network and remain connected. Every time I log in and need to print something, I have to disconnect the printer and reload all of the printer software. I have tried to call Brother to have someone trouble shoot the connection, but I get a recording. There is no toll free number for support and the only number cited in the documentation has live people during normal business hours. It is a beautiful printer, when it works. But very frustrating when it is after business hours and nothing will print.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M Bezara

customer_reviews.title: Works good but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Don't expect a laser printer. This is a throw away printer but it usually prints quality documents. paper often gets caught. I have bought 3 so far as backups.
customer_reviews.author: Brothaweb

customer_reviews.title: Headline:  Old lady buys new printer
customer_reviews.text: Well, I had to get a friend to help me hook it up, but have say, it works great. Still don't have the scanner and fax parts hooked up, but both my sister and my daughter have theirs hooked up, so I know it will happen. I think this printer is a great value. GREAT value.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Kate Murphy

customer_reviews.title: a printer that will work with my computer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a printer that would work with my older apple. this does work well and although I would have bought one that did things easier, this is working out just fine. I was glad to find what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: An execllent printer at any price.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these Brother Inkjets. The individual ink cartridges make the printer the most cost effective on the market. The photos it produces are some of the best quality achieved from much higher brand of Inkjet printers. Software for all of the functions are easy to understand for any beginner using this type of All-In-One printer.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS TITOLO

customer_reviews.title: but it's pretty easy to tell when that happens and it's obviously ...
customer_reviews.text: Generally a solid machine. Sometimes it will grab more than one sheet at a time and screw up with the printing, but it's pretty easy to tell when that happens and it's obviously easy enough to just print out another sheet. Considering the price and the low ink costs, it's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: brother printers
customer_reviews.text: i like brother printer. great price and it does what it made to do and ink is easy to get oem ink work great dont have to spend 60.00 on ink
customer_reviews.author: james dougherty

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: It is standing the test of time. Logical menu choices since I can't find the instruction manual when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Jos Avet

customer_reviews.title: Good Printer
customer_reviews.text: I do like this printer. I' haven't been able to play with printing photos on it due to my lack of photo paper-so i can't judge that yet. It sure does cycle a lot in copying or printing. I leave the printer on and it cycles itself at least once a day on top of in between copies or printing...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J. Wieber

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer & now that I have wifi I love it even more The way iot uses the ink is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ichabod

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best, not as easy to pick up ink for, but if you order what you need here, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Monte J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: printer
customer_reviews.text: great product and it sure beats my old one. so easy to use and easy to clean. great service and Brother is the best.
customer_reviews.author: alicejulian

customer_reviews.title: All-In-One
customer_reviews.text: Great, first time for me with all-in-printer. It is so easy to use, especially for all the functions, scans prints copy, and fax features.
customer_reviews.author: Ducktown2010

customer_reviews.title: Brother printer
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this printer easy to operate beautiful clarity when it comes to printing out photos and documents. Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: A quality economical printer
customer_reviews.text: My printer stopped working abruptly and in researching various printers liked this one because the ink cartridges for it were less expensive than most. It was easy to set up, had crisp beautiful printing and nearly a month later am still using the cartridges that came with it. I was very impressed with this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Ogabes

customer_reviews.title: Brother MFC-J430W Is Terrific
customer_reviews.text: This affordable all-in-one printer/scanner/fax does it all! Easy to install. Easy to use. Print quality is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: F. Krutchik

customer_reviews.title: Great printer with a great cost per page ratio
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I was tired of paying a ton to print on my old Lexmark printer. This printer has greatly reduced my cost per page ratio without having to get a laser printer. The only thing I wish it had was duplexing but I think there might be a version that does.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: this is really very good, more then i expected, without any set up, we can print from our iphone 4 , very good, very happy that i bought this item. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: jitu pandya

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have an easy to use printer, that is easy to trouble shoot. I can fax, and scan as well as print and copy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Shehadeh

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with this model.
customer_reviews.text: This model is not as good as the previous model I had, the MFC-J410W. It picks up 2 or three papers at a time and it is very annoying and waste of paper and time. Can not print multiple pages without having this proplem. I wish I did not giveaway my previous model, used it for over a year without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn Ano

customer_reviews.title: Great value printer scanner and fax.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for use in business and have found they are worth every penny just in the ink savings you can find online.
customer_reviews.author: TooJacks

customer_reviews.title: ALL in one
customer_reviews.text: This is OK for light work (small home office). It is make very cheep, but the money I paid was still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: vgmckee

customer_reviews.title: Brother products yes!
customer_reviews.text: I Like It! after years of using I am sick of hp products now...brother products seem to show that they want my business. Works great and software makes a whole lot more sense - allows more options/settings. Was here Fast!
customer_reviews.author: Dagmar Eah

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer
customer_reviews.text: Was my first wireless printer and for the price it was the best purchase on amazon this year....the ink price to replace is great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Geritano

customer_reviews.title: Ink Eater
customer_reviews.text: It eats up A LOT of ink. We buy the high yield ink, but it still feels like we're buying ink every two seconds and we don't print that much.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not good enough
customer_reviews.text: It would be fine for ordinary printing, but much of my work is maps which need to be small and yet clear enough for canvassers to see street names. It didn't make the grade on that criteria.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we love it!! so easy to install and they have tons of cheap ink on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LISA BENNETT

customer_reviews.title: A very good, high quality printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer does color copies very well. Prints very quickly. It arrived on a very timely manner and is working very well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wendell Hart

customer_reviews.title: Easy easy easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, can use high yield ink carts, easy to figure out how to use, has great features and the software is simple.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa M. Cottone

customer_reviews.title: Printer works great
customer_reviews.text: The printer was easy to set up, the quality of the print is fine. The outside casing of the printer itself is a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne L

customer_reviews.title: brotherinkjet copier
customer_reviews.text: It is very reliable and I would buy it again I would recommend it to all my friends. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Not complex
customer_reviews.text: I have a speech problem, therefore the fax is my main means of communicating my thoughts , this fax was easy to install and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: antonio perri

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my office
customer_reviews.text: Got this printer for my reports and graphs, so far so good. I may give a followup review later after I have used it a bit more. Very easy to set up on my network.
customer_reviews.author: Washington Rain Camper

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful;, prints everything I want
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a long time now. It is wonderful;, prints everything I want, scans great, only part I don't use is the fax, have no phone line, bought the cheap ink through Amazon and that will keep me going for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer...
customer_reviews.text: The set up for the printer went fine... both hardware and software... document feeder works great... print quality looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: It's OK for an inexpensive printer
customer_reviews.text: It's OK for an inexpensive printer but I've had problems getting the ink to work when replaced. It's light weight and sort of flimsy but it will do for homework.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Neal

customer_reviews.title: I won't ever buy another Brother printer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just a few months ago and have had so much trouble with it! Now I keep getting a message telling me the printer can't read the ink cartridge. I bought a new cartridge and still get the same message. I had heard Brother makes a good printer which is why I bought this printer. I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa G

customer_reviews.title: Failed after initial ink cartridge
customer_reviews.text: This printer setup easy enough. It worked great until we had to change out the ink cartridges. 1 day after that, the print head started to need cleaning. It now needs cleaning every other day. Its 3 months old! complete junk. Get a laser printer, you will be much happier you did.
customer_reviews.author: Cherwell IT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Printer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer. The quality and speed of printing is great and it's fast and easy to set up. It would be a five star except for the fact that it's a little more... fragile than I expected. If I dropped it it would definitely break. Other than that though, it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Price

customer_reviews.title: Brother its a doosie
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to get her up and running , but with a little help from my son its working great . I m hoping it will last a long time.I was stuck at getting the clock and time set. She looks good too. I think its the best looking one they make.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sutton jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like this new copier my grandson installed it and he is only 12 !! Easy to install !!!! Works great and fantastic color
customer_reviews.author: deborah skillen

customer_reviews.title: i lovet it
customer_reviews.text: is the best printer that i see in my life, the brother do a good word i never go chane that product.
customer_reviews.author: Yan Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Like the unit but it tends to be slow. I had problems with scanning and connecting the scan to IPhoto
customer_reviews.author: jennie Morey

customer_reviews.title: Brother Printers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for daughter in college. She is an A student and deserves the necessities to help her continue her education. She is my princess and my heart is overwhelmed with providing her with her needs. I can't afford much but she is happy and that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Suduko Free
customer_reviews.text: I like this version very much. It shows how many of each number I have found. Also, if I click on a square in the puzzle, it shows all occurrences of the number in the square. It's fund to play.
customer_reviews.author: bbl

product_meta.title: Brother MFC-J430W Inkjet All-in-One
product_meta.description: Compact, wireless all-in-one for the home or small office. Wireless networking helps reduce cable clutter. With no wires, it’s easy to set up your printer where you want. Fast, reliable printing — up to 10 pages per minute in black, 8 in color (ISO standard). 20-sheet automatic document feeder for simple, unattended copying, scanning and faxing. 1.9" color screen lets you preview your photos. Professional-quality prints at up to 6000 x 1200 dpi resolution. Energy Star compliant. Adheres to the EPA's Energy Star standards, to keep energy consumption and operating costs as low as possible.
feature_bullets: Compact, wireless all-in-one for the home or small office.
Paper Handling size - paper tray: Letter, Legal, Executive, Envelope (C5 Envelope, Com-10, DL Envelope, Monarch, JE4 Envelope), A4, Photo 4"x6", 3.5"x5", 5"x7", 5"x8", 8"x10"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars193 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
